definition: exercising influence or control, an allele that produces the same phenotype whether its paired allele is identical or different
details:
adjective
- exercising influence or control
= example: exercising influence or control
- (of genes) producing the same phenotype whether its allele is identical or dissimilar
- most frequent or common
= synonyms: rife
noun
- an allele that produces the same phenotype whether its paired allele is identical or different
= synonyms: dominant allele
- (music) the fifth note of the diatonic scale
